--- exname: ames-kaggle1 expoints: 1 extype: string exsolution: NA categories: - regression - data - kaggle - string - kaggle date: '2023-06-01' slug: ames-kaggle1 title: ames-kaggle1 --- # Aufgabe Berechnen Sie ein einfaches lineare Modell für die [Ames House Price Kaggle Competition](https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/house-prices-advanced-regression-techniques/data). Hinweise: - Orientieren Sie sich im Übrigen an den [allgemeinen Hinweisen des Datenwerks](https://datenwerk.netlify.app/hinweise).









# Lösung ## Pakete starten ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(easystats) ``` ::: ## Daten importieren ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} d_train_path_online <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sebastiansauer/Lehre/main/data/ames-kaggle/train.csv" d_test_path_online <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sebastiansauer/Lehre/main/data/ames-kaggle/test.csv" d_train <- read_csv(d_train_path_online) d_test <- read_csv(d_test_path_online) ``` ::: ## Model definieren ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} m1 <- lm(SalePrice ~ OverallQual, data = d_train) ``` ::: ## Neue Daten vorhersagen ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} m1_pred <- predict(m1, newdata = d_test) ``` ::: ## Daten einreichen ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} d_subm <- d_test %>% select(Id) %>% mutate(SalePrice = m1_pred) head(d_subm) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display}
| Id| SalePrice| |----:|---------:| | 1461| 130972.9| | 1462| 176408.7| | 1463| 130972.9| | 1464| 176408.7| | 1465| 267280.3| | 1466| 176408.7|
::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} write_csv(d_subm, file = "einreichen-kaggle-modell1-yeah.csv") ``` ::: --- Categories: - regression - ames - kaggle - string
